review:
At first it was okay but after sometime I got some errors during the use of
camera and touch sensitivity while using keypad is less, sometimes I have to
press 2 times on the keypad and I get some kind of disturbance while using
Bluetooth headset. Its like I've got a defective piece or something I don't
know but I feel like I've wasted my money.

My first one plus device. I got it on first primw day sale and review after 2
day of usage.  
Battery 9/10  
Screen 10/10  
Sound 9/10 (I'm big fan of Dolby atmos sound missing it)  
Awsome gaming experience.  
No heating problem.  
Various LEDs.  
Fast performance.  
I'm in love with it.  
Buy it if your budget is 30-40k  
You won't regret.

Post the review after using it for 3 months. This is the best phone that I've
ever used. Actually it's a big thing that an 37K product is competing with 60K
products and 90K products. And always the winner is OnePlus 5T. And now
OnePlus have officially announced that OnePlus 5T is the world's fastest phone
than in case of performance and charging. I really like the Dash charging
which is very useful in case of less time. And oxygen OS is the main
attraction of OnePlus, because it can be customised in the which you like.
Nothing much to say I has all that what you need.

Awesome phone. Had issues with the first order. Amazon was prompt in replacing
the mobile. New phone reached me within 3 days.  
Pros and cons have already been discussed by other customers, but I am totally
happy with the product.

Excellent phone, great and smooth operating system, fabulous battery backup,
amazing camera, for an existing Apple user like me its a very smooth change
from an Apple to a Android device. Excellent UI, great storage and ram. It's
an top of the line device and a premium product from One plus.

I am beyond happy with this buy. If the thousand+ positive feedback/reviews do
not convince you to buy this monster, I don't know what will.  
  
Yes, the hype is real.  
Yes, the reviews are legit.  
Yes, this phone is badass.

Writing this review after 2 days of usage (6GB RAM version)  
1\. Excellent smartphone/ look/feel/device and screen aspect ratio.  
2\. Great performance/speed.  
3\. No overheating observed. Yet to explore it's gaming performance.  
4\. Quick/ Dash charging is good.  
5\. Easy/quick face and finger print recognition.  
  
Minor complaints  
1\. Mobile back case and screen guard provided for 6GB version are not great.
Could have been much better.  
2\. Battery life is good but could be improved further for continuous mobile
data usage/ON.

Pros:  
1\. Looks Premium  
2\. Face unlock is swift  
3\. Camera is exceptional. I mean it!!  
4\. Good Battery back up  
5\. Smooth performance  
6\. Humongous screen. Its a paradise for gamer and video/movie watcher  
7\. Stock android experience  
Cons:  
1\. Could have bundled headphones in the box  
2\. Still waiting for Oreo update  
3\. Pre-applied screen guard is of not so good quality  
  
If you are looking for a perfect phone. Go for it!!

Best flagship cellphone in this price range.  
Pros  
Great battery  
Comes with free TPU case  
6 GB RAM makes it a beast wit no lag at all. Handles multiple apps with ease  
Great photo quality  
Video recording is also great.  
Battery easily lasts more than a day with medium usage  
  
Cons  
HD screen, but I guess this has been done to preserve battery life over a
single charge. Also HD screen detail is not noticeable in this screen size.  
Using the inbuilt photo enhancer with the camera seems to alter photos to make
them look like posters.

An amazing phone. Worth all the money spent on it. Sleek, blazing fast, face
recognition works beautifully even in low light, cameras are awesome, display
is really good. Truly a flagship killer I suppose. I'm really enjoying my new
phone. Would totally recommend this to everyone. It makes no sense to shell
out more that double of what this costs on so called flagships when you can
get more of everything than those at this price. It's like they say. Never
settle.

title: This phone is worth every penny you will spend.
Awesome :)
Five Stars
but product is very good..
A great phone to have..
Love you One plus you are amazing
Flagship Killer
The Best Phone I have ever purchased
Speed
Liked it but would have loved it in 28-29k price bracket
review:
This phone is really awesome.  
1- It's incredibly fast.  
It's so fast that you will not see any app taking time to load. It sometimes
makes you believe that the Face lock is not working but the truth is that your
phone will be unlocked before your eyes even notice it.  
2- Reading mode.  
Reading mode is the best feature a phone can give for book lovers or late
night WhatsApp users. It's really very useful. Your eyes will not strain that
much. Although you can't compare it with kindle. It's still good.  
3-Camera  
I will say it's not like Google Pixel 2 but it still performs pretty good.  
4- Fast Charging  
I charge my phone before going to office. I plug in the charger at the time of
getting up and the moment i come out after taking bath, the phone fully
charges. It charges very fast. In 30 min my phone goes from 50% to 100%.

Such an awesome phone... I haven't tried anything other than Samsung before...
A new phone this is to me.. and it's nice to use, really!... The camera
quality is good.. depth effect is good... Speed is great.. there is no lag at
all.. overall, would recommend to everyone :) This phone is worth your money
for sure :) !!

Undoubtedly the best mobile in the market currently.  
  
Bought this product after researching for months and was 110% satisfied with
it.  
  
Just buy it without even giving it a second thought.  
  
You will be satisfied in every way possible.

Its awesome its been about more than a month nvr faced any issue or lag it's

PROS  
1.Brilliant Display  
2.Fast and Safe unlocking  
3.Extremely fast UI  
4.Big Battery Life with ultra fast charging  
5.Pure Android and Clean UI  
  
CONS  
1.Too slippery without the cover  
2.Camera quality not upto the level of pixel/Iphone/s8/note.  
3.Updates are not on time  
  
Conclusion: A great smartphone with lots of feature and lag free performance.A
phone I would recommend to anyone with the budget of 30 to 40k.

Best phone for this price range. Magnificent build, Blazing Performance
(thanks to the futuristic hardware), Dedicated Support from OnePlus (they
listen to you), Regular updates etc etc. I mean in this price what do other
companies give you? Just a phone right? Oneplus gives you a commitment. A
commitment to bring satisfaction. Its been close to a month I purchased this
phone and I havent faced any issues apart from minor ringtone volume bug (for
which oneplus released the 5.0.4 update by the way, thats listening to
customers, apple samsung motorola lenovo take notes please). The pictures are
awesome. Night photography is simply out of the world. With decreased shutter
speed and its brilliant algorithm for low light, it produces day like images
in the night, even under just celestial lighting. Try it to believe it. I am
attaching few pictures which were taken at 1AM in absolute lack of lighting.
Overall 10 out of 10. Go for it.

Awesome phone for this era and value for money. Case provided is great. Go for
it if better options not available at the time. Clever battery and performance
optimization thus lightning fast charging and processing. Nice ester egg.

Great display, best battery utilization optimization with a very very fast
charging..... operating system could be improved a little  
Good processor, a very good low light back camera, performs good in normal
lighting as well obviously. Front camera could have been improved and more
functions could have been given in stock camera app though I like use of
screen as flash while taking selfies in low light  
Overall a good phone.  
Giving 4 stars as I feel the price is a bit on higher side given the chinese
competition in market like Huawei and xiaomi but hey one plus don't reduce
their price over time like them which is a plus in a way

title: Review after first day
Great Value for Money
The underdog of 2017
Amazing Phone & True Flagship Killer!!!!!
GREAT PRODUCT 1+5t
TAKE IT AND GOOO
Awesome phone
Tough competitor
Amazing Product with all the specifications at this price
Amazing buy.
review:
Delivery: obviously fast and accurate.. Love you Amazon for that  
  
Product: Awesome in terms of performance and battery life. Means downloaded
1.6gb update couple of times on 4G, watched videos etc. Still battery on 35%.
So no problem about that. Just loved this part.  
  
Problems which I've observed are with OxygenOS rom. Alert slider is BS. Many
of tiles are removed and apparently I cannot turnoff Do No Disturb mode with
latest update of Oreo 8.0.0

Excellent display. No lags whatsoever.  
The minimalistic bezel is a great plus in n terms of the design. Great value
for money.  
However, the camera is a bit disappointing. Photos are not that great as
compared to those captured in Google Pixel / iPhone X.

After a month of usage i feel oneplus is a real competitor to apple , samsung
and other conpanies.  
  
The major advantages are -  
1\. BATTERY  
The one plus 5t has a great battery life. It has dash charge which is i feel
the fastest available on market. Within 5 minutes it has around 10 - 15
percent charge. It also holds up good for games such as asphalt 8 and modern
combat 5  
  
2\. CAMERA  
The camera is amazing. It can take great portrait pictures . A professional
photographer will truly love this phone. Even in darkness the camera works
just fine  
  
3\. PERFORMANCE  
This phone can do amazing multitasking. It can smoothly run 5 - 10 apps
without any lag. This is especially useful if someone uses this phone
continuously for hours.  
  
4\. SECURITY  
The fingerprint sensor is the fastest I've seen. And the face unlock too is
very fast and during emergencies , time will not be wasted on trying to unlock
the phone  
  
5.DISPLAY  
Another mind blowing feature is the display. It is bezel-less and the display
is truly amazing. The colour contrast is very good  
  
6.COST  
I believe this is the best phone below 50 k and while it may be cheap for what
it holds, it rivals the power of the galaxy series , the apple phones at half
the cost  
  
That being said , no phone is without any disadvantage. However these vary
from person to person . Some which i found with this phone are -  
1\. Due to the phones size the fingerprint sensor is a bit hard to reach  
  
2.the feel of the phone is a bit different and so adjusting will take a week's
time  
  
This phones scores in all areas and i feel this could really change the tide
in mobile phones in the near future

I am writing this review after using this phone for 15 days. In one line this
phone is value for money in true sense.  
  
Pros  
1\. Processor is super fast & not observed a single lag in 15 days. Even
running faster than my Galaxy S8+ (may be due to clean UI as compared to
Samsung).  
2\. Display is Excellent in this price range. (Should not be compared with
High range phone like Pixel, Galaxy S8 etc.)  
3\. Dash Charging is mind boggling Fast. Used so many phone with Fast charging
capacity but this one is best.  
4\. Battery Back up is decent can run for 1.5 days on single charge with
medium usage.  
5\. No heating issue even after heavy usage.  
6\. Amoled Display notification is cool & look nice.  
7\. Rear Camera is superb in daylight condition.  
8\. Fingerprint Sensor is fast & surprisingly Face unlock is also super fast.
(wasn't expected that much accuracy for Face Unlock before buying)  
9\. One of the best advantage is OP team listen to their customer for any BUG
or Feature improvement & provide update frequently.  
  
Cons.  
1\. Potrait mode not available in front camera.  
2\. Speaker could have been better in this price.  
3\. It should have at least IP67 rating.  
4\. One Basic in built music player should be added in Oxygen OS.  
  
Overall in this price range my rating for this phone is 9.6 out of 10.  
Those who are willing to buy a mid range phone which have all the quality of
Flagship Phone go for it without any 2nd Thought, you will not regret.  
If your main priority is Camera & can spend some extra buck should try for
Pixel or Galaxy S8. In this price range you will not get better camera than
this in any other phone.

Blazing Fast  
Both Delivery was done in less than 24hours of order  
May b advantage of being PRIME customer....  
Product is really good impressive I feel somewhat is 5t bit taller may b t for
tall ..but is absolutely stunning display...  
Great work by OnePlus Hope u improve the camera performance bit better  
Assistive lighting face unlock is totally blazing Fast...now can unlock in
full dark area...Kudos again..

BEAST !  
Huge jump for me after using my OnePlus One for 3 years.  
  
OnePlus has produced a beauty of a smartphone with the new 5T.

disappoint.  
  
Pro's:

Headphone Jack is still there !  
  
Con's :  
Could have used stereo speakers

Playing games awesome. Face unlock and finger unlock too is the fastest.
Awesome screen. Thank you Amazon and OnePlus for bringing this mobile.

Amazing buy... The phone is just too fast and the Amoled display just lights
up the phone.  
Camera is too amazing. The portrait mode provides such great depth to photos
that you can't stop clicking them.  
Video Slo-Mo is great too.  
  
The Snapdragon processor 835 is inarguably the best. No heating issues and in

Sleek design makes it look so elegant in your hands. Its a MUST BUY.

review:
Switched from iPhone 6s to OnePlus 5T and having used this beauty for about 20
days could say that I made a good decision.  
2 major problems I had with my iPhone was camera and memory(was using the 16
GB version), 5T has an amazing camera that ckicks sharp and crisp pictures
comparable if not better than Note8 and iPhonex. Also Memory is not an issue
anymore.  
Have saved 17k over my last purchase and I still get a better Phone, what more
could I ask for :)

Great display I liked the 18:9 aspect  
Super fast performance (installing apps in seconds, that's crazy)  
Double satisfied with the camera, including front camera  
Long lasting battery and insane Dash charger fill the battery less than hr.  
But somehow I don't like the music listing experience in 1+ (poor bass)....
hope an upcoming update will fix it.....

Excellent product. Value for money, super fast and smooth operations. Camera
quality superb. Face unlock feature is a beauty, battery lasts more than a day
even with heavy usage. At this price point, other smart phones are way behind.
I have used One Plus One, One Plus x, One Plus 3 and now this 5T, all are
simply superb.

Amazing device. The Display quality is excellent and its Light weighted as
compared to Galaxy note 8. The camera is also improved in Low light.  
Case and pre-applied scratch guard provided with Phone is very good though.  
Over all very good experience with amazon delivery and Oneplus 5T Device

I am writing this review after using Oneplus 5T(8gb+128gb) variant for 20days.  
PROS:  
1\. Look and feel - 10/10. The feel and look of the phone is premium. The grip
is also good. 6.01inch optic super amoled display is superb. Viewing angles
are amazing from any angle it seems same.  
2\. Ram - 10/10. 8gb Ram is very fast  
3\. Battery - 9/10. Fast charging. Lasts 10-15 hrs with medium usage!  
4\. Storage - 9/10. U get 111gb.There shd have an expandable slot!  
5\. Processor - 10/10. Totally awesome. No lags even when multitasking.
Switches to the apps very quickly.  
6\. Touch - 10/10. The response is very good. Even a light tap does the job.  
7\. Camera - 9/10. Ultra fast focus. Crisp clear pics. Takes clear photos in
daylight and a decent one in low light without flash. Has a pro mode too which
is extremely useful in low light photography. Bokeh effect in portrait mode is
awesome. Clicks perfect selfies.  
8\. Network - 10/10. No network issues.  
9\. Charging - 10/10. Extremely quick charging. Full charge within 40 mins.  
10\. Speaker - 10/10. It's loud and clear. Good output for music too.  
11\. Security - 10/10. Facial recognition is very fast and accurate even in
low light. Now with recent update of virtual light, facial unlock in dark is
also not a problem anymore. Fingerprint scanner is very fast and convenient.  
12\. UI - 10/10. User friendly and easy to use. Feels like stock android.  
  
CONS:  
1\. No portrait mode for selfies.  
2\. No expandable storage.111gb is sufficient.. But the kind of pics this
phone generates, it shd have 1.  
  
Using a Nillkin black backcover which gives it a premium look.

Moved from Nexus 6 to One Plus 5T and using this for the last two months. It
is the best bang for the bucks in the price range. The total 33k it is worth
in all aspects. People mentioning no IP 67 rating and all should be told that
it is just the numbers and I recently used it during a speed boat ride where
it was splashed with waves quite so many times and still it runs damn smooth
without any issues. Those who pick up this device will be very well aware of
the specs and that need not be told. Only thing, please buy a good phone case
(even though it ships with one) as the device is slippery and you dont want to
see a cracked 18:9 screen soon after you start enjoying those movies on this
device.

Excellent phne..!  
Good display  
Amazingly fast phne  
Came is above expectations  
Actually was lil confusion weather to take 5t or iphone 8plus... But guys thns
god i did not buy 8 plus.. This is excellent phne for half of the cost n I
saved half of the money... Superb phne anyday i suggest it go for it guys

Best bang for buck phone in the market today. Looks and feels great in hand.
Slick and smooth user experience and surprisingly good headphone jack audio,
beast of a phone in performance & portrait mode works well too, rear & selfie
cameras are good enough in low light, you'll not feel shortchanged at all.
Battery life is good too and lasts for a day easily. Auto brightness
calibration could be better.

I was using iPhones since birth however after iOS 11 release iPhone has become
so much buggy,every alternate day we get new iOS release.  
Hence I thought to switch to Android and I saw 5T coming.  
Super performance in terms of everything  
Say it battery, display, face I'd and Charging.  
We cannot keep spending blindly for a brand name who is not stable in terms of
software updates.  
Thanks Oneplus, you're a saviour.

I'm definitely pleased with my 5T. I held myself from posting a review for
almost a month to test and see if it's consistent. And yes. It definitely is
consistent. This is the best purchase for the price and for the performance.
The battery life is enough to get thru a day with some left over if you aren't
a power user. The camera is good. The build is solid. The screen is darn good.
And the UI is smooth and close to stock Android. Definitely worth it!

1\. Flip to screen off

One word for it -Awesome phone . Great service by Amazon and green mobile. Got
it in one day instead of 2 day delivery. The only thing was there was no offer
of any kind or cashback like I got 10% on my last purchase of Moto G5s plus.
About phone everyone know what it is and it is right now best in the market.
The only cons I can think of are-  
  
1) It has no memory card slot for it and although it is 128 gb , it is still
somewhat less for me.  
  
2) This phone and all the other Andriod 7.1 and 8.0 phones do not support
Miracast. They only have chrome cast. And after trying hard I can't
connect/screen mirror it to my Sony Bravia TV.  
  
Apart from these two the phone is good the performance of phone is better than
latest iPhone. The camera quality is great but still it lacks if you are a
professional camera/DSLR user. But for the price you are getting all this is
worth it. It is a total VFM.

Simply amazing.. it's one of the best android phones i've used so far. Speedy
boot, agile processing and UI is intuitive.. simply fantastic. I'm happy with
my decision. battery lasts upto 24 hrs on full charge, though depends on the
usage so might be different for others, but I received upto 24 hrs on the
first day of use. Camera is good, though not that great, but manages good
shots. One can't get bored of this one so easily.

I was searching for 2-3 months to buy phone which really gives me value worth
its price. Finally i have zeroed down my searching to Oneplus. Then I was
waiting for launch of One plus 5T Lava Red as I didn’t want buy that usual
colors. Finally, I bought Oneplus 5T Lava Red on the very first day of launch
i.e Jan 20, 2018 and got the same at an attractive price (got good old mobile
exchange price and instant credit card cash back). Amazon delivered the same
within 48 hours. This was all about my purchase.  
  
Now about the phone:  
Best part of this phone is its camera – superb DSLR quality pictures.  
Looks- Awesome looks.  
Functioning- with 8 GB RAM, it functions flawless.  
Display is superb.  
128 GB memory is very much sufficient storage.  
OS 8 Oreo is another added feather.  
There is lot more to explore in this phone which I will be doing and updating
soon.

Amazing phone with good specs. Been over 2 months now, battery backup is
really good after using the phone with leaving data & location on for the
whole day & playing heavy games for around an hour and also some usual phone
activity, the battery still remains around 35% which is really good. The
camera is quite good, but it's not that good for low light conditions.The
phone is not too big as it seems from the dimensioning. The steel back looks
stylish but there's no grip at all, this is why OnePlus gives the silicone
case. One good thing about OnePlus, you keep getting updates for bug fixes
regularly. The face unlock is absolutely stunning, better & faster than iPhone
X. It also works in complete dark areas. The finger print sensor at back is
quite handy. Dash charging is a life saver if u forget to charge ur phone,
it's really quick. All over it's the best in class within this range.

I brought this phone for my dad on his birthday he paid the bill but girf from
me and I must say this is the best phone I had ever seen used in my life .
Perfect can describe one plus 5T in one word .My dad always used to say that
why these phones are so costly and are they even worth ? I think he got his
answer .He loves this phone .  
  
The features I think this phone got are -  
1\. Charging speed ,If you never owned a flagship phone in ur life than
believe me you would be stund by it's charging speed it's incredible .But I
would point out one thing that the battery life isn't that great but kind of
average .  
2.user interface ,If you love stock Android like I do, you would love one plus
5T.  
3.Snapdragon 835 is a beast doesn't matter how heavy a game is it would crush
it like candy crush .  
4.Camera .I love it's camera it's super fast and pexilation is a never seen
friend .

No doubt oneplus is the best flagship smartphone manufacturer.  
Best phone, fastest phone. The most i love is the face unlock which is
insanely fast.  
Also beats iphone X in speed test.  
Just go for it. Dont think twice

title: Excellent phone. I'm very happy with it
It is a very good phone in a Price budget of 35000
Best Buy For 2017
Awesome phone. My previous phone was MI Max
Excellent phone no heating at any time while charging and ...
This is an amazing phone with no bloatware unlike others
Great delivery and exchange experience!
Excellent mobile for now and next year
Value for money.
Awesome Phone in this price range. True flagship killer. Go for it !!
review:
Excellent phone. I'm very happy with it. Best bang for your bucks. The in-hand
feel is spectacular. Devices felt very well balanced & the weight distribution
is almost spot on - this is something which Apple has executed well in the
past. Glad to see OnePlus paying attention to these details. The screen is
bright, clear & unless you pixel-peep with a magnifying glass, you won't
notice any pixelation. Battery life is also acceptable, lasts for a day &
topping it up with the dash-charger is easy-peasy.  
Photo quality is mostly great under normal conditions and unacceptable in
darker situations. But that's okay with me. I didn't pay a small fortune like
I would have for getting an ivy-league iphone or a Pixel. Overall, great phone
& I don't see myself upgrading or changing anytime soon. This phone offers all
the phone I would need for the time being.

It is a very good phone in a Price budget of 35000. As one plus is giving
everything that a smart phone of 2018 should have. Camera quality is superb
and bokeh effect is good too. Performance wise it don't lag and battery
performance is also decent.  
The users who like to play a lot of games then it is a good phone for them as
it didn't heated much and didn't lag even on games like Nova.  
  
So far it is a very good phone to buy in a Price budget of 35000

Took a while to get used to such a good phone. Blazingly fast, simply refined,
brilliant camera... Lots to like. You have to use it to know just how well it
performs, like a charm. Order via Prime sale, came in under 24 hrs and since
never been set aside. Check out more reviews of it. And don't believe the hype
that it's not good enough. The others are way too expensive to compare and
still this trumps them.  
Blindly do go and pick this. You'll regret you thought of anything else.

Posting this review after all most 1 month use. I bought it early prime sale.
Awesome phone. My previous phone was MI Max. That was quite big phone.. but I
love 5T, user friendly easy to handle. I can feel the change. Only problem
which I'm facing sudden app close, I don't no whether it is hardware problem
or apps. Becoz of this I'm giving 4 starts. Cameras are awesome, front facing
camera is amazingly clear.

Using since a month, Excellent phone no heating at any time while charging and
Charing and talking.  
Can choose which application should use the mobile data network , as in
iPhone. I left iPhone due to double sim requirement.  
Mobile cover + Screen guard is supplied, but NO HEAD FONE

Have been a Samsung user throughout before switching to one plus. This is an
amazing phone with no bloatware unlike others. I am happy and amazed with the
phone with regards to the battery, design and almost everything. One plus has
a dedicated team who hears community and work on creating a phone that user
wants unlike big brands who works to make more money. Would definitely
recommend this phone without a second thought.

Recieved the product within 18 hours, and exchange was hassle free. Have only
been using the phone for a couple of days now but so far so good! Have only
charged the phone for 20 mins in the past 2 days, and the battery is going
strong, which is a huge change from the earlier phone!

I have been using mobile over a month now. As of now per inoovation available
in market, this has perfect hardware spec and performance. Particularly camera
3d effect. Amazing! As if DSLR is in hand, love to take pics now. Mobile is
very fast may due to optimised hardware and 6gb ram. 6in screen with 5.5 inch
traditional mobile size, very handy.. finally it's thin and low weight..great
mobile to own for next 3 yrs, provided Oreo and Android 9 updates are
available..

The first thing I love in this the screen.  
I think this the best value for your 33k.  
Everyone review channel mentioning wireless charging in this device but I
think we don't need that charging because my device charge it full in one hour
and around.  
The best thing about 5t is rear camera set up. But about disappointment from
front camera because it won't capture in wide angle.  
But overall it's an amazing devise till now experience.

Mind blowing Phone. Truly flagship killer. Go for it !! It's close to 15 days
now since I am using it and I loved the phone so far. Sharing my overall
experience here.  
  
1\. DELIVERY - Thanks Amazon for On time delivery 👍.  
  
2\. LOOK & FEEL - One word - SMART 😎😍. Extra care to be taken though while
putting the phone on to the surface as rear cameras are bit seeing outside
from the body. Can overcome this by using some decent back. One transparent
Back cover is provided in the box along with screen guard applied on the phone
screen.  
  
3\. PERFORMANCE - Incredible so far. No lag. Played multiple Heavy games like
Asphalt extreme, Taken, 3D tennis etc and OP5T welcomes and handles them
pretty smooth with no phone heatup observation so far. Oxegen UI - Simplicity
is the best. I am on Android - 8.0.1; Oxegen OS - 5.0.4.  
  
4\. BATTERY - Awesome so far 😎. I usually charge in alternate days with avg 5
hrs screen on time. Dash charging is gr8. Takes approx. 1 Hour to charge from
2 to 100% (Screen-shot attached).  
  
5\. CAMERA - Great Camera. Not much settings to tweek. But having multiple
modes (Pro, photo, slow-mo, selfie, portrait - for Bokeh feature to shoot DSLR
like photo which works pretty well). Decent low light photos. Selfie camera is
decent. However, couldn't find Bokeh feature in front camera so far. Take a
look on the shoots attached.  
  
6\. OTHER FEATURES -  
\- Loudspeaker and headphone sound quality is decent.  
\- In built call recording feature is good.  
\- Extra features are pretty smart  
\-- 3 fingers screenshot.  
\-- 3 diff display modes (Normal, Night & Reading which make the display B&W
and can be enabled app wise.)  
\-- Multi-tasking while making one app minimise on bottom side of screen just
like YouTube videos and look something else on phone.  
\-- Game-do not disturb mode.  
\-- Face unlock and finger print scanner are super fast.  
\-- Taking selfies from finger print point.  
  
6\. OP COMMUNITY APP - Keeps the users up-to-date with the phones updates etc.
Get instant response from OP team.  
  
CONCLUSION - Overall it's worth buying phone indeed comparable to it's other
competitors available in market in this price range !!

Best for the price.
Great phone. Superfast and amazing experience
Witness the raw power and speed
It's software is smooth and fast and best hardware. camera is better but rather than nature ...
Amazing Job by oneplus.
Simply the best phone in the world taking all factors into consideration.
Performance and price at it's best!
Its good but has the Chinese feel.
Best Battery efficient phone
review:
Simply awesome.. Best in the market. Only one request.. Should have included a
better cover/case and an earphone. It will be a nice gesture.  
Mobile is a beast no doubt about that.

Bought this after exchanging the OP3. I think the display is what makes this
phone absolutely magnificent. The battery life is insane! You get minimum 4hrs
SOT.  
It's light, premium and feels good.  
The camera is average. Yes it is average in low light. To he totally honest,
it's bad in low light. Even the portrait is meh. Software updates may improve
that.

Great phone. Superfast and amazing experience.  
Very good camera quality: back as well as front. Also, it has nice depth
effect feature.  
Very good configuration.  
Performance is good. No lag at all.  
Sound quality is decent enough.  
Best phone in this price range.  
  
Drawback:  
Could have provided SD card expandable memory.  
Design could have been something unique.

This phone comes with the flagship hardware from all the aspects excluding the
display resolution (which is far better many other smarties in this price
range). OnePlus has yet again proved their capability to deliver a beast
without hitting the price bars high. And they have already established a very
strong fan base in India as well as the international market. I gotta talk
about the camera here. Whoaaaa... Not the best one for those who use it in
Auto mode. But once u step into the Pro mode, you will definitely feel the
effort OnePlus has put into this phone. Just amazing with the freakin fast
SD835 chip powered by the-jaw-dropping 8GB RAM. Some people are so worried
about the SD card slot. We have 128 GB storage which for me would take my
entire life to get filled :P. #LaveRed: the new color invented by OnePlus :P.
I suggest them to better obtain patent rights for this color. For a rufous
person like me, this phone is damn sexy. Forgot to mention the screen
brightness and the vividness. It is one of the best in its class.  
Final word: Yet another victory for the #TeamOP #Kudos.

This phone has unbelievable speed of charging. It's software is smooth and
fast and best hardware.  
camera is better but rather than nature photo it processes the image and make
it look beautiful.  
Physical appeaance of mobile is way average compared to what we see in
pictures and battery is 3400mah which is one and only drawback of this
flagship phone.  
Overall it is best phone to buy but i think it is over priced by around 5k.  
You can definitely go for it even if this negative sounding review.

This one from oneplus is just amazing, the build quality is top notch, just
holding it feels premium and the overall UI experience is fluid and coming to
the camera though he had provided with same sensors having same focal length
it manages to take good portrait images even in low light than that of oneplus
5. Coming to accessories the addition of a silicon case with the smartphone is
good Add-on from oneplus. So to include with the review I would say you won't
regret once buying it and using it, so it's a big yes from me for people who
are looking for perfect budget smartphone which is capable to compete with the
high end ones easily.

Worth your money when compared to other flagship phones. They are over priced
while this serves your need with same and even better specs at even lesser
price. Don't forget to use the other benefits like 12 months accidental
protection (because of this there is no need to worry about water
resistantance) and zomato gold (already unlocked it thrice in a month. I'll
see if I can get my phone's cost using this :p ). Iam in love with my phone
after many years.

Simply the best!  
Using this phone for the past one month now. It is undoubtedly the best phone
in this price range. One plus has done it right, combined the best hardware
with the smooth silk and user friendly software.  
Pros:  
1)Beast in performance with snapdragon835 processor and 6/8gb RAM.  
2) Almost feels like unlimited storage with 128gb variant.  
3) Dash charging- 0-full charging in 1hour 10 minutes.  
4)full 1 day battery life with heavy use. 1.5 days with light to moderate use.  
5) Highly customizable software- gestures and navigation button functions have
made power button obsolete.  
6) Blazing fast face unlock and the fastest finger print scanner in the
market.  
7) A very good camera for the price range.  
Cons:  
1) Audio and speaker quality could have been better.  
2) Low light photography needs improvement.  
3) No portrait mode in front camera.  
  
Apart form all these, this phone just destroys all competition in this price
range. A must buy for someone with a range between 30-40k.

Everyone must be knowing the pros of this phone, so I will just point out the
cons:  
1\. Sometimes touch becomes irresponsive.  
2\. Should have provided secondary lens as telephoto lens.  
3\. Low light photography is not that good and looks noisy and artificial.  
4\. The led notification sometimes blinks wrong colour.  
5\. Dash charger sometimes won't work and you need to remove and insert once
again.  
6\. Sometimes Sound comes from speaker even after plugging earphones.  
7\. Very bad placement of power and volume buttons.  
8\. Alert slider is not comfortable to use.  
9\. Sometimes ringtone go silent while receiving calls.  
10\. Many indian units have issues like sudden call dropping, call connecting,
noise during call, voice breaking which is not a network related problem when
we checked.  
11\. Ambient light sensor works weirdly which makes me to increase the
brightness manually.  
12\. These things makes me feel like using a typical Chinese phone. It is
actually Chinese though 😉

Got Yesterday, still running at my first Charge(24% right now) with 8+ hours
of screen time. Everyone knows OP 5T is Flagship phone in specs and
performance, thing you don't know is more than Flagship level in Battery
performance. I'll give my full review after 3months of usage.  
  
P.S: don't need to charge for 8hours at first charge. I unplugged after 100%.
This is lithium battery don't need that old style 8hours charge. Google for
more.

Experience.  
Loudspeaker Volume is very high, just Quality of sound is not as good as Pixel

Extremely happy.

Service :

About the phone :  
  
This phone's a killer...  
  
For a user like me who jumped from j7 prime to 5T, this phone has a lot of

Best at low light photography...  
I guess they have to work on fixing the stability issues on 4k video mode.

i must say it is one of best phone in the market. i ordered on 30th Dec and
received it next day and since then i am going ga- ga over it.the
built,design,looks,features..everything u name is just amazing.  
i got 8GB phone and the speed is mind blowing.  
if you are seriously looking for a phone and having a budget of 30+k must go

Everyone knows features and performance by seeing videos and reading different
articles. for me it's as per seen in YouTube unboxing and article I read
before purchasing. I will give five star

The product was delivered on time! The packing was great. Product condition
was top notch. Everything about the phone is great. Except maybe the back-
facing fingerprint sensor. It works like magic, but I personally don't like a
back facing fingerprint. Face unlock Is really fast. Marvellous job by One
Plus. A slight heat up in playing really RAM consuming games, but that's
understandable. Overall, it's a great device ! Certainly go for it.

Was waiting for the phone badly but missed it's first sale but got lucky to
get it on it's second sale. Purchased in November and using for last 40/45
days  
Got cash back also...  
  
Now about phone..  
  
Display - 5 on 5 - amazing viewing experience, be it low light or in sunlight.
It has got amazingly bright screen and very gentle on your eyes at the same
time. just opt for adaptive brightness with night mode timings on  
It's best view and great for eyes as well.  
  
Camera- 5 on 5 - Amazing camera quality. You would never miss your DSLR when
you have this phone in your hands.  
Camera clarity is amazing. Choose any mode you want for different effects and
it gives you an amazing quality picture, be it low light or bright sunny day.
I got a portrait made out of pictures clicked from this phone with size of
about 4 feet long. Not even a single sign of blurr here.  
  
Performance- 5 on 5  
Best phone ever used till now for multitasking. Used several makes like apple,
Samsung, blackberry, Sony but never got such great performance. Wether using
heavy games or any other official work. it's switches very smoothly
everywhere. Finger sensor responds very quickly and also face recognition is
smooth and phone unlocks really quick on face recognition. Voice recognition
also works well. Never found any difficulty or issue in this 45 days of use.  
  
All in all  
Best phone in market.

Just discovered that Blue tooth not working correctly after the very first
month of purchase...

Shifted from Iphone 6s to one plus 5T.. was hesitant initially.. But 5T nailed
it.. super smooth.. blazing fast.. beautiful phone and great display as well..
did not find any lags/slowness till now.. starting to love this.. Face unlock
works just fine.. (Sometimes in rooms with low light it does respond after a
few secs except that it works decent ) We anyways have a finger print
authentication as a backup.. very good purchase..

review:
I just love it!  
The performance is simply awesome. This phone is crazy fast.  
The AnTuTu benchmark score is 208809  
Camera is good and it's better than Iphone. Can't compare it with Sony
flagship phones even though it has got Sony lens.  
Fastest Face recognition ever  
Battery life is awesome  
Dash charging is simply great!  
This phone never ever slows down on heavy usage and there is no heating issue.  
  
Check out for protection cover in Dbrand India. It's awesome, you can
customize the back cover as you wish.

Brilliant all round phone... Excellent performance, display is superb and a
good camera for the price point.. Face unlock works surprisingly awesome

An excellent phone. I upgraded to oneplus 5T from S5 and the new larger
display + increased speed is a breath of fresh air. Great phone and excellent
value for money. The Star Wars customization was what tipped the scale for me
as I weighed buying a similarly priced android phone from different companies.

The OnePlus 5T is clearly a winner in all aspects.  
I've been getting consistent 26-30hr battery performance (Location permanently
set to high accuracy, switching between 4G and WiFi, medium to heavy usage),
the screen looks great and performance is on par with the flagships(if not
better).  
The camera could be better but is good enough for everyday shots.  
It's a clear, reliable and stylish choice for people looking for high end
performance at an affordable price.

This is the most perfect android device out there which can compete with an
iPhone (switching from apple, as am not happy with iOS11).  
Everything about the device is awesome except for the low light camera
performance, which is also not bad compared to other phones at this range. but
since they claimed it to have it improved so much with that secondary camera i
had high expectations and it was a bit let down.  
  
Apart from that I am glad i waited a while for this one. definitely
recommended as an happy customer.

The phone is the best I have ever come to use.  
This has a great camera and everything is just so perfect and smooth, the
desire to use this phone is uncontrollable.  
The phone has 3500 Mah battery, which due to the large screen size, struggles
to pass through the day and gives a screen ON time of about 6 hours at low
brightness. But, the dash charge compensates for that high speed reduction of
battery.  
Wish that this phone had a bit more bigger battery.  
Rest! This phone is the best!

Rated the best value for money phone of 2017 and deservedly so.  
  
• Vivid and sharp AMOLED display  
• Wonderful battery life  
• Dash charging is amazing  
• Face Unlock (though not new to Android) works extremely fast and well in a
wide range of lighting  
• Android Oreo about to come to the OnePlus 5T  
  
Overall a very good buy for the mid range price bracket providing a near high-
end experience.

Overall Nice Device.  
  
Good points:  
Excellant Performance,  
Nice battery backup  
Display is good.  
  
Bad points:  
Camera picture on dim light is not very good

Timely delivered.  
The phone comes with super clear large display. Sleek body and the design will
keep you amazed.  
Good battery life and high quality picture clarity.  
Speakers are way better than my previous phones.  
Overall the experience is very good and I feel contented with my purchase.

Nice super fast fone, good for gaming, every one better buy 128 gb version, no
heating whatsoever, camera better than previous one plus, doze mode has been

title: My honest review
... 3 months now and I have got a really good experience from it
BEST FLAGSHIP PHONE
Brilliant phone. Really snappy
OnePlus the best and beast android phone ever in mobile industry
Just one word 5T is awesome whether its camera or its performance
superb phn with really fast dilivery !!!!
Value for money #topnotchof2017
One plus 5t 64 GB
Excellent phone for a great price!
review:
I use this phone for one month but this phone is very good and very fast
performance and looks like a very smooth this camera is perfect dual camera
Infinity displays the best display segment display PPI is best face lock and
fingerprint based 8 GB RAM and 128 gigabyte help your performance mobile..
that's it so no hesitation go for it

I have been using this phone for about 3 months now and I have got a really
good experience from it. The phone is having Soo many awesome features but one
which makes this phone so unique is the charging speed it charges too much
fast and drains battery really slow so the phone is really good in any sort of
emergency this. OP5T gets a little bit warm than others that is because of the
over clocked CPU and it's warmth is almost unnoticeable. The is also really
good for gaming too which means this phone can run any game on it and by any I
mean any game (fortnite is also coming soon for mobile). Also it has also
received Android Oreo update so enjoy the latest OS. At last let me mention
the camera it takes beautiful pictures. The sound quality is also good not the
best but not bad either. Overall people might think that it's an expensive
phone but something you need to realize is that the features like 8 GB RAM ,
Snapdragon 345 , Aderno GPU , fast face and finger print unlock, 6 inch AMOLED
display, 3300 mAh battery , ultra super hyper speed charging speed you can get
all these features in any other phone for minimum RS 70000 and One Plus 5T is
just RS 38999.  
Also for a side note my OP5T is Star Wars Edition.

Fantastic phone , its really a flagship killer . The phone is extremely fast ,
and the camera is just awesome including the portrait mode and slow motion
video recording.  
Its really a compiditor to Samsung flagship products and iPhone.  
But only one cons of this phone is that the portrait mode is not that much
efficient in low light conditions , however its not a major factor . Its
really a fantastic phone special the built quality and the processor , its
just fav.  
I love this phone💓

Brilliant phone. Really snappy. Its been a smooth experience since i bought
it. It comes with a pre applied screen protector and and a black translucent
back cover as well. Best part is the dash charge.it charges 0 to 100 in around
50 mins. And the battery is big enough to last an entire day.

Writing this review after 2 weeks of usage..  
Battery - last easily upto a day and more (moderate usage)  
Performance - butter smooth  
Camera- very crisp and clear even in low light (zooming reduces somehow
quality but not an serious issue)  
Built- slim and handling is easy on hand  
Was very confused to select mobile as dis is d first one plus company mobile
for me .But I did the right choice over Samsung ..Any 1 planning to buy it
with having budget 33k go for it without hassle free.

It is a good phone but I can't say it can perform in the long run better than
Samsung.  
What I like the most is face unlock and finger print.These both are quick. It
is a slim phone.I like the camera too.  
It's speed is also good. Overall I am happy with the phone. I don't know how
it will perform in the long run. Dashcharge is not that quick but it is ok.I

Thanks Amazon.

I have been using this phone for a little over a month now, and it has been
great. Having previously used the note series and the iPhone 6, I am very
impressed with the speed and smooth performance of this device. The superb
technical specs do translate to a great user experience.  
While the camera might not be on par with the pixel 2 or the iPhone X, it
certainly is a good camera and since a side by side comparison is unlikely for
most users, this makes for a great value for money proposition.
